name: Joi Ford
text: LONG wait while the employee took her 45 minute lunch. Mind you the lunch hours posted are 12-1 and this was at 1:45. She LOCKED THE DOOR! Clients kept knocking.  People with appointments could not get in!  She was by herself. I get that you have to eat, but as nurse I haven’t received a lunch break many times! You eat quickly and keep moving! The lab closed at 3:30!

name: Austin Hart (SmartFishing)
text: Appointment at 9, got there 8:45. It’s after 10 and still haven’t been seen. People lined up in the hallway. Understaffed and unprofessional. Get with it Labcorp. People have other things to do than wait until it’s convenient for you to do your jobs. Update: Waited 4 hours and was never seen!

name: Brandy Taylor
text: Worst lab experience ever. I am shocked that this place is still in business. Very unprofessional staff.  First clue should have been what lab runs out of collection tubes needed for common laboratory testing?!?! Do yourself a favor and go to another laboratory.

name: Sean
text: I had as lovely of an experience as you can expect from a blood draw.  Tons of CORONA safety measures in place and each staff I interacted with was extremely pleasant.  Labcorp was efficient and painless (always a nice bonus)

name: Josiah Radcliffe
text: Hours of operation show they are open til 3pm but when you arrive there is a paper sign on the door that says they are closed from 12-1pm for lunch. So frustrating after making the 45 minute drive and arriving at 12:10pm!

name: Elizabeth Taylor
text: This is the worst place I've ever tried to contact. I took my 1 year old to get his labs done (he has epilepsy and other disabilities so this is crucial for dosage regulation). They did great with handling how rough everything went to getting his blood. But a week later the office in Harvest, AL called me after hours and didn't have a message. I tried calling back immediately but they didn't answer. Days later, I contact his doctor and they never faxed over his results. The doctor office and I have both been trying to call the office for days and they won't answer the phone. I even called right when they opened several times today and nothing. This is absurd. You should never ignore the phone if you have the ability to answer and I STILL need the results. I will never recommend this office or any LabCorp to any friends or family members.

name: Stacey
text: Make an appointment on line and  they have highly skilled phlebotomists.  Never had a problem and Naomi ROCKS!  Thank you!

name: Philip Hahn
text: I get it, no one likes having their arm stabbed, but I have never had problems with this location. Wait times seem reasonable, checkin is streamlined, and it's convenient to where I live. Staff are nice and do good work.

name: Annette Charles
text: This place sucks. Very short staffed. Extremely slow. Patient care is none.... Do  not recommend this place. My Doctor suggested another office. Should have went to the other one... I have no clue what they are doing.

name: Linda Shawley
text: They are always friendly and helpful

name: Emily Ford
text: Great people. Was in and out in probably 15 minutes for a urine test. Very nice ladies there

name: Levi Griffin
text:
I went in for blood work, and the staff I encountered were friendly and professional. I did not have an appointment, but they were able to see me right away.

Drawing blood from me can be difficult, but the nurse was able to do it quickly with minimal discomfort on my part.

I have read the negative reviews of this establishment and can say that I did not encounter any of the problems they reported. It seems the issues with unfriendly staff have been corrected.

If I need any further blood work done, then I won't hesitate to return here for it.

name: James Shipma
text: Terrible customer service. Tried to access my results online: had to make an account, OK I can do that. After creating my account, I was told that my information was incorrect. It was not. After THAT I re-entered the correct information and then the system said the information couldn't be validated and I had 30 days to resolve my account (?)... I called my local location and I got a machine telling me the address and office hours, and if I needed help getting my results online, to go to the login portal where all this mess started. I need these results to begin my job and it's taken far too long. Very disappointed.

name: apps apps
text: Service is terrible here. If you have a choice go to HH lab

name: Lily Jaiswal
text: Very slow. Not open for lunch

name: Bob Birmingham
text: Used them many times. Never had a problem getting blood drawn.

name: Aaron Lussi
text: What a useless business. How are you going to schedule someone during your lunch break and make them sit and wait for an hour, cause everyone leaves. Why isn't there an option for 0 stars?

name: Sharon Webber
text: My experience at this office for a simple drug test was horrendous.  The woman working there, Donna Bourdeau, was extremely unprofessional, uncaring, and rude to my children and me.  She refused to allow my daughters to sit in the lobby while I was in the restroom (a total of about 3 minutes for the entire drug test including paperwork), though there was no one else even in the office.  She was aggressive, curt, and downright mean.  Do NOT go to this office if you have children or prefer not to deal with a woman such as this.

name: Google User
text: Will never use this LabCorp again. Doctor ordered some extensive tests. Had to go by the lab to pick up supplies and collection instructions.  Not only did the woman at the front mess up one of my tests, but she offered very unprofessional and unsolicited opinions about my testing. Have written a formal complaint letter, but after reading all the negative reviews about LabCorp, I doubt anyone in the company will give a hoot. This woman at the Jeff Rd location needs to leave the medical field immediately, and flip burgers for a living.  She is completely inept, unprofessional, and unable to maintain an acceptable level of discretion and maturity required for this job.  I will never step foot in this location again even though my Dr's office is directly across the hall. Thankfully, I took my tests to HH labs where they caught the fact that LabCorp messed up one of the tests. Will only go to HH for any future tests.

name: James Stubblefield
text: Very un profesional. I had to get a drug test required for admissions to one of my classes. THe two ladies that were there were very unprofessional!! They kept arguing back and forth when I told the lady at the window I was ready for the test, She yelled at the top of her lungs YOUR DRUG TEST IS READY! and there were people in the waiting room! And the ladies cell phone kept ringing!! I will report to Calhoun that they need to find someone else to do the drug panels!!

name: Kimberly Cooper
text: This place isn’t staffed adequately enough for the volume they receive. Appointments are merely suggestions. I was seen >30 min after my scheduled appointment time. Staff was very apologetic.

name: Franceska Wackmann
text: There's no need to make an appointment, because even when you do they will still take the walk ins. Despite the fact they knew there was an appointment coming in. I asked how long it will take before she got to me,  she responded she "doesn't know, there are two ahead of me."  I looked at the clip board,  the "two ahead of me" didn't have an appointment.  Meanwhile I came on my lunch break.

name: AU Link
text: Very unprofessional,  they did not want me to be there when they opened up

name: Kara Davenport
text: Wait was well over an hour. Only one employee working. Terrible service and experience.

name: Joi Ford
text: LONG wait while the employee took her 45 minute lunch. Mind you the lunch hours posted are 12-1 and this was at 1:45. She LOCKED THE DOOR! Clients kept knocking. text: Wait was well over an hour. Only one employee working. Terrible service and experience.

name: Glenda williamson
text: Very organized . Ladies are nice and efficient. Results are done in a timely maner

name: Pablo Meza Duran
text: It is closed. May 2021.

name: william whitaker
text: Nice Doctors and staff

name: Kimberly Rossler
text: Nobody is at the front desk ever !! The first visit they lost my orders so I was prepared to bring my orders in this visit . Horrible… I even made an appointment but yet have been sitting here for an hour. This location is just sad, always has been but my doctor called orders into this location.

name: Joy Glenn
text:
First of all when you enter the office, absolutely NO instructions or a human being to instruct patients to use the kiosk to sign in. We waited FOR OVER ONE HOUR to get lab drawn. Every one that came in went back while we waited and waited. FINALLY  we were called back by the ABSOLUTE RUDEST human being on this earth!  My daughter which is very sick and afraid wanted me to accompany her....the lab tech asked her if she really needed me, from then on her attitude was worse and worse.  After my daughter told her she was a hard stick due to little veins, boy, she took that to heart. Another tech came in and we finally left.
Yesterday, we received a call that there wasn't enough blood so we were told to go ahead and go down there they will be waiting. MIND YOU we were under the assumption they closed at 5 p.m. due to what we were told the last time we were there. we arrived at 3:55 p.m. we went in and the SAME rude lab tech which NEVER told us at that time they were closing. EVERYTHING we TRIED to ask she cut us off in the most condescending tone and was ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS!
.

name: Charlene Smith
text: Aisha Gilmore was my technician today. She was absolutely fabulous! Not only was she friendly and professional, she was so gentle that I never felt the needle. I didn't even realize we were done. Thank you, Aisha, for making this a quick and easy experience.

name: Christopher Peters
text: Angela provided top notch customer service. I appreciate it!

name: Scott Knowles
text: Went this morning & had the best experience you could have when takin' a drug test. Very friendly staff who did a great job getting me in & out quick as possible!! Very satisfied!!!

name: Nolan Crowe
text: I had to get blood work done today, the lady who helped me,  her name is Angela. Quick and friendly.  Didn't feel when she drew the blood.  Recommend this place.

name: Rhonda Allen
text: I choose the location on Montlimar because of the EXCELLENT service provided by the ladies at this location. They try their best to give you a Great experience. Aisha is very cordial, helpful and makes sure my orders are processed correctly. Angela is virtually as painless as it gets for a very sensitive me. She takes the fear out of getting lab work done. 😀Her kindness flows as well.

name: mickey swaboda
text: They hang up on you multiple times if you try making a appointment

name: Summer Davis
text: Went in to do a drug test today. I waked in and was immediately told to check in at the kiosk. Once I went back to do the test the directions the woman gave me were said very quickly and were mumbled. I thought I heard 30, so I assumed I needed to fill the cup up to the 30 line. I came back and she asked me (with an attitude) if I knew I was supposed to be doing a drug test today and did I not have to use the restroom. I told her I thought it was enough and She told me with an attitude again that it was supposed to be up to the 45 line. The only reason I’m giving two stars is after I told her that she rushed through the directions she SORT OF apologized and said she does it so much a day she goes quickly. I understand she does this all day, but you’re dealing with people. Some of these people have never done a drug test before or it has been a fairly long time. It needs to be done with less of an attitude. I shouldn’t walk out feeling stupid or like I was taking up her time when she’s paid to do this.

name: Laura Christian
text: Aisha was great and got us in quickly and made the experience painless even with our two kids in tow.

name: Perry Reed
text: This was an amazing place. Got there right when they opened and was literally out in 10 mins. The young lady who helped me was sweet and very good at what she does. Wished I could remember her name but either way amazing job. It's people like you that make things like this easier to deal with.

name: Todd Phillips
text:
The ladies at this office were Wonderful!! Aisha was very nice and had a Great personality!!  I was their less than 45 minutes. I hope they can get more help so they can answering alot faster.
RTR!!!!

name: ROBBIE SEAMAN
text: Get skipped and wait for hours

name: Gene Parnell
text: Sloooowwwwww

name: Alan Hinkel
text: I didn’t hear, hey how are you. I heard “ You have to check into the kiosk first “ Okay. I went to the counter and said how long will it be. I heard “ Well, there is one, two, three, four people ahead of you. “ I can count. I don’t know how long it takes for each patient. So, before I even go back, they’re getting 1 Star. They shouldn’t get that.

name: Jasmine Terry
text: In and out very fast. Friendly professional staff.

name: Casey Welborn
text: Rushed, but thorough and accurate. Just wish they didn't rush people so much.

name: Cryo Xeen
text: Told me the bill would be $100, sent me a bill for $300.

name: Carrie Ann Mattimore
text: The name of this business is Health Link. My doctor ordered some blood levels to be tested whenever I had the opportunity to get it done. The staff here are extremely friendly and was able to easily get blood out of my very difficult veins!  Would definitely use this lab again!

name: Leigh Corfman
text: I regularly have lab work done here. The staff is always professional and good to work with. I would suggest them to anyone looking for a lab to use in Gadsden, AL. Thanks!

name: Jason Welsh
text: Got blood work done, only got stuck once. They also will give you a text when they are ready for you so you don’t have to wait in the lobby.

name: Keith Landers
text: Very unprofessional.  Web site to check your labs does not work correctly and the lab work was not posted 3 weeks later and noone could tell me where it was.  I will have to have the lab work done again at another facility.  Will never use this one again.

name: Roy Reynolds
text: Came in for a pre-employment drug screen, a simple urine test that LITERALLY takes minutes. Waited almost an hour.... 💩 NEVER WILL GO BACK TO THIS LOCATION. HORRIBLE

name: stephanie self
text: Quickly got my lab work done.

name: Sherry Rylander
text: Unprofessional staff. Intimidated my Mother into paying a bill from 2015 that had already been paid.

name: Jesse Boldt
text: Rude

name: Khalil Caldwell
text:
I went here a urine screen and was initially treated great by a young man that took my sample and acted professionally.
Unfortunately upon calling a week or so later was greeted by a very unhappy, frankly rude female receptionist. I asked if there was a result for my test and she then mocked me saying, “If didn’t pay for the screen then they own my urine” (laughing in condescending tone).
I understand that these offices have no incentive to treat their patients with respect because companies usually pay for their services; however, it was unusual to be treated disrespectfully out of the blue by a stranger that was probably having a bad day.
Good luck if you are an employee having to deal with this company. 👎🏽👎🏽

name: Linda Kicker
text: Staff person did a great job. It was painless. I was taken on time. Clean office.

name: Michelle Downs
text: They were very professional, friendly and timely.

name: Ebony Peak
text: I went to this facility to have labs done. I was sent here by my doctor. The company charged me a fee that wasn’t supposed to be charged, did not complete all my labs, did not even have all the labs that were requested by my doctor. My doctor then reached out to them advising me that they were not supposed to charge me anything. Was advised that they were to be issuing me a refund to call them to go pick it up and was treated horribly as if I had done something wrong. The lady who answered the phone had a nasty attitude and talked sassy to me. I don’t recommend this facility nor would I ever visit here again.

name: Stacia Gaines
text: I really appreciated the courteous and accommodating staff person who worked me in.  Their process was streamlined and felt safe.  The test was not painful, and they called me with results within 2 hours.  They did seem to be short-staffed, but the folks that were there worked hard to keep things running smoothly.

name: Kendra Chambers
text: I went to ARCpoint for a COVID test last Friday and the process was seamless! The receptionist, Amy was SO friendly on the phone when I booked my appointment. When I came in, I waited for just a few minutes and quickly got tested. Kim, who administered my test has an excellent bedside manner and was also very kind! I received my results the same day within an hour. This was truly a wonderful and stress free experience!

name: Earl Pecor
text: They knew i was there for a hair drug test for my job and seen i had short hair but didnt say anything till i waited a hour to get called back.

name: Sarah Edmonds
text: Scheduling was quick and easy. I called in the late afternoon and was able to make an appointment for the next morning. At the time of my appointment, was very easy and fast in and out.

name: Sherry Harris
text: I highly recommend ARCpoint Labs of Birmingham.  They are quick, efficient, and welcoming.  They stagger their appointments so you are not sitting in a waiting room full of people waiting to get a Covid-19 test.  They also give you all the information to file your insurance for the fee.  Best of all, results by the end of the day!  I was so impressed that I shared their contact information with the entire staff where I work.

name: Victoria Ebrahimi Charles
text: Unfortunately I’ve had multiple covid tests. Brian makes the test almost painless and is very personable. Every person on the staff is helpful and goes out of their way to make the experience as easy as possible. Great facility!

name: Maria Schaffer
text: Easy to make an  appointment.  They get you in and out fast.  Staff is very friendly and helpful.  Great experience.

name: Don Blackall
text: Awesome people. Quick and easy. In and out testing. Quick results.

name: Kristen Dixon
text: I was very pleased with ArcPoint! I was in and out and the staff was amazing!

name: Sergio Hernandez
text: Worst place ever!!!  Brian the guy with earrings and completely rude will send you back telling you a lot of BS if you get there 30mins before closing, their sign and website says that they do ”take walks in” but it’s a totally lie, they sent me away twice (second time I was there 1hr and 20 mins before closing)... Pretty much you can tell this guys just wanna go home and don’t care about their costumers...

name: Forsyth White
text: Very easy and quick test - and results emailed quickly!

name: Michael Hill
text: Very courteous and professional. We were in and out in just a few minutes and the results of the test was emailed to us before the end of the day.

name: Nancy Harris
text: The staff was professional and efficient!  It couldn’t have gone any better.  Appointment at 10:00 and I was told results would be available by 430. I had an email with my results within two hours.

name: Rebekah Wales
text: The fastest appointment I have ever been too. I was tested for COVID here twice. I was not in the facility for more than 10 minutes from the time I walked in to the time I walked out. Everyone was very friendly and I had no issues. Would definitely recommend.

name: Andrea Thames
text: Everyone in the office is always so nice!  Love how quick they are!

name: Chelsea Johnson
text: Went there for Covid testing. It was clean and felt safe. I was in and out quickly. The staff was friendly and professional. I got my results within an hour. I highly recommend this testing facility!

name: Shiraz Merchant
text: Great experience - Prompt, professional, courteous and timely results.  Makes no sense to try and save a few dollars and deal with the zoo's at the doc in the boxes when you can come to ARCpoint Labs.  You get what you pay for!

name: Luis & Megan Devoto
text: Front desk receptionist was new but friendly. Male nurse who gave my 4 year old the Covid test was friendly. I'm not certain he went far enough up her nose for the test, but I'm not a nurse so I trust the process.

name: Tara Lang
text: Went in for a antigens test. They tried to talk us out of it to do another test that cost 2x more and refused to put through insurance!  They even crossed out the Test the Dr ordered on the official order and put the test they wanted to run on it.  Very unprofessional.  We walked out and went to Labcorp.

name: Will Grimmett
text: Friendly Staff, Quick and Easy. Got in and out of the office fast

name: Vicki Yarbrough
text: Easy in and out. Courteous staff.

name: Mark Zakutney
text: I appreciate how accommodating ARC was on short notice.  Friendly folks and extremely helpful.

name: Cherry Moody
text: Had a great experience at ARC point labs!  They took great care of my family!

name: Daniel Topping
text: Fast friendly efficient service provided for a COVID test. Thank you so much.

name: Deidre Lesley
text: Staff very friendly and professional. No long wait times. I would definitely use them again.

name: Bobby Reuse
text: Short wait, super nice people. In/out quick. Highly recommend.

name: Jacob Pearce
text: Had a problem with a drug test done. Management went above and beyond to take care of me after the initial issue.

name: Deborah Grant
text: Great experience- friendly staff was very responsive to my needs! A very well run office!

name: Thad Mickler
text: Friendly and outgoing staff. Speedy results. Very positive experience.

name: Amanda Franklin
text: They were easy to get an appointment with, quickly got us back when we arrived, and got our results back same day. Would definitely recommend them and use them again.

name: Tracie Stricklin
text: Quick service...I was in and out in around 10 minutes. Professional and friendly staff.

name: Wendy Hartley-Gregerson
text: Fast in and out. Staff very friendly.

name: Bama Grad
text: They went above and beyond to get us quick results for our trip.  Thank you do much

name: Louis Dina
text: Courteous, efficient, Safe, wearing masks and scheduled our appointment to maintain social distancing, reasonable prices. Mailed our samples off and they arrived at the laboratory right on schedule.

name: Doug Preston
text: Excellent service and staff

name: Harrison Brannon
text:
Timely friendly professional
Testing with results expedited to our cellphones

name: Jason Hogan
text: Quick, reliable screening services!

name: Lindsay Walker
text: A little expensive, but great service and timely results.

name: Stephen Anderson
text: Professional, fast, friendly and efficient.

name: Barry Thomas
text: Fast simple and very helpful staff.

name: David Fowler
text: Fast, friendly and great communication, highly recommended !!!

name: Josh Hillman
text: They were very professional and quick.

name: Gabriel Velez
text: Very nice and on point I was in and out in no time very professional.

name: D Thorn
text: Highly recommended. An extremely high standard of professionalism.

name: Denesha Cuneo
text: Very professional. Didn’t skip a beat to provide education and make me feel comfortable.

name: David Tosch
text: Very professional and quick.

name: Sherri Dunn
text: I took my son here for lab work. We were in and out quickly! Great customer service. I highly recommend!

name: Holly Adams
text: Fast and great service!

name: Vincent Dichiara
text: Very willing to accommodate.

name: Andrew Jernigan
text: Great team, amazing service and even better pricing. Highly recommend.

name: altaf virani
text: good and fast service

name: Lula Taylor
text: There are the best in and out

name: Tereca Spain
text: The people are very nice. I don’t like the way the sign in is done. Today I had to help an elderly gentleman sign in with the the machine. I like people check in.

name: Carrie Madrigal
text: If I could give it 0 stars I would. Terrible service and their 1 hour lunch is actually an 1 1/2 lunch.   Needs reprimanding and accountability desperately!!!@

name: Lane Widick
text:
Serious lack of space and waiting area. They need more workers to get folks through quicker.

The people inside are really kind. It’s not their fault. 5 stars for staff. 0 stars for everything else.

name: Savannah Jones
text: Outside door wasn't open, had to walk around the other side of the building. We get to Labcorp after nobody answered the phone all week, nobody there at opening. We finally go to digitally check-in when we look at a sign and an associate opened the door 45 minutes after opening. They do not do drug screen testing on Saturdays, even though it allowed us online to schedule it for Saturday.

name: Joshua Newsun
text: For some reason the take over a hour and a half for lunch seems alittle rediculas... along with some one being late to the desk when there lunch is supposed to be over...just dont come unless u have all day.

name: ERICA GULLEY
text: Fix your website. Why allow people to make appointments for services that you don’t even provide on Saturday????

name: elsha fornefeld
text: They were efficient, humorous, and it was painless except a slight pinch. Will go there every time from now on.

name: John Sheffield
text: Posted hours are until 4:00pm CST. I arrive today at 3:40pm as the lab is closing for the day. I was told by a staff member that they do not accept walk-ins after a certain "time" to avoid OT. Therefore they would not see me for these labs.  If this is their "policy", it is not publicly posted on their window next to the operating hours.  Unacceptable and unprofessionalism by the staff.

name: Lisa Woodall
text: I have very tiny veins and Labcorp's technicians usually find a good one on the 1st try.  Quick and painless!  Good job!!!

name: Tim Tripp
text: Fast, professional, efficient.  Make an online appointment, it goes a lot faster and it helps them keep you from waiting.

name: L Graves
text: My first experience with LabCorp was a 4 hour long blood test. I was treated professionally by very pleasant people. Making pleasant visit out of this long ordeal. Thank You Ashly and April.

name: Dave M
text:
Staff is very good
The wait is ridiculously long
Just looked at Labcorp profits apparently horribly mismanaged probably the reason they are understaffed

name: Grant Stephens
text: LabCorp is just a small section of the building it lies within, but I only had to wait 5 minutes to take my drug test. I arrived just before 9 AM, and despite being a few minutes early, I was allowed to take my drug test a minute or two early. I only had to wait 5 minutes, and water is provided in the lobby if needed for the test.

name: Patricia Green
text: I have been here one time for a blood test. My experience was that I was treated very courteously by the efficient staff and the visit went very quickly.

name: Charles McCraw
text: I have dealt with this location on two separate ocassions and both times i received swift, curtious service.

name: Kenneth Johnson
text: First time visit and the nurses were very helpful and friendly

name: Cathrine -Cate Summer
text: Wow just had one of the worst sticks in my life this young man in a dirty Med scrub stuck me so hard that I was feeling it 5 minutes later.  The whole office appeared to be very run down

name: Kay Wilson
text: Staff is professional, areas are clean but the process is extremely slow at this location.

name: Mike Campbell
text: You ca forget getting them on a phone.

name: scott mcfarlen
text: Good job

name: Justin Soeung
text: Slow

name: Ashley T.
text: Really quick in and out. Woman who helped me and did my test was nice and quick. I came in with 3 others behind me and they seemed to get called in not long after. Reviews had me worried for nothing

name: Jake Geveden
text: Horrible, horrible, horrible, horrible experience. They refused to do my test and give me results because the color of my the container I was given and provided back to them was the wrong color.  I am so absolutely frustrated by this awful experience

name: Amy Wedlund
text: I had a great experience at the Montclair location. I highly recommend making an appointment. It is easy to park, easy to check-in, and the staff was incredibly nice and efficient.

name: Amanda J Vaughn
text: The personnel have very little people skills and act like robots. The tech barked orders at me, didn't explain anything, and acted annoyed when I asked for clarification. This was by far my worst experience, just use a different location whenever possible.

name: Stephanie Keller
text: Been to two other Labcorp with no issues. Go to this one and had nothing but problems and it seemed like no one would listen to what I had to say. Then I had an issue after I left and called the office. No one would answer the phone. I have now left a few voicemails over the last few days and they refuse to call me back.

name: Darian Bester
text: No need to make an appointment because they do not follow them. Currently 30 min after my appt time.

name: Sarah McClure
text:
This location is CLOSED. I made an appointment online a week or 2 ago. I showed up and checked in online through the “wait where you’re comfortable” option, where they text you when they’re ready for you to come in. so I waited in my car. After 40 min I decide it’s taking too long. When I get inside the building, they have a sign on their office saying they are temporarily closed?!
That’s fine, except I was never notified of this change after scheduling my appt. Confused as to why they would not inform me of this or why I was allowed to check in for my appointment that apparently didn’t exist anymore the day of. Huge waste of time. Very disappointed in the lack of professionalism and consideration for others.

name: Jessica Dallow
text: Terrible service. Made an appointment, claimed I hadn’t done the proper paperwork so had no information. Rude and unhelpful. Go somewhere else.

name: Gabrielle Pass
text: Employees very rude and unprofessional. Would not recommend.

name: Jamie Polk
text: Absolutely the best service and the lady who did my lab work was the best

name: Daniel Bolus
text: Hours are actually 7:30 to 4:00 Monday through Friday. Tasha was fantastic. In and out with my drug test. I would recommend getting there at around 7:25 so you can get in and out as one of the first people.

name: Megan Waldrop
text: I went here for an employer drug test. I made an appointment for 11 am and arrived about 10:30. I was in and out before my appointment time. Very friendly and professional staff. 10/10 recommend this facility.

name: Jimmy Harris
text: My visit was very pleasant. The wait from front desk to lobby area to in a chair was only about 12 minutes. The staff was really nice and the young lady Tasha, who drew my blood, I didn't feel any pain and she has a wonderful personality......Beautiful person. #Great job Labcorp/Montclair Road

name: John Newton
text: Staff is extremely rude. Seems like they have no idea what’s going on. Avoid going here at all cost. Appointments made online do not matter.

name: David Seidel
text: They have a computer check in, which did not get my info.  So after 20 minutes they asked if the could help me.. then had me check in on the computer again.  Construction in front means you come in thru a side door.

name: A Google User 8
text: I had a great experience considering the circumstances (getting my blood drawn). The lady at the front desk was really friendly to me, then she took my blood and did a great job!! I'll use this facility again if I ever have to again!

name: Austin Green
text: There are no hours for this location. I had to go to yelp and yellowpages to find out the closing time to only discover when I got there that they close earlier than what was referenced. They close at 4 and I got there at 4:05 and even explained that they have no hours of operation up and they wouldn’t not let me take a drug test. For reference the hours are 7am- 4pm and be prepared for terrible service

name: LaToya Maiden
text: The receptionist Lakeisha is rude. The other ladies that sat around her are also rude. I said hello how are you and she basically dismissed me and I  said hello again mind you there are four women sitting in this room and not one of them said hello, how can I help you. Finally the older lady in the room said how can I help you. They're not professional, There is know customer service period and they seem to be angry women by there tones...

name: Face Card
text: Employees are really rude. Customer Service skills should be a priority.!!!! No matter what the field of work is. A simple smile and or saying Good Morning takes a mere split second.

name: April L. Butler
text: Came in for a pre-employment screening with my registration sheet and ID, as I was told to in the LabCorp email.  I was told by the person at the desk once I signed in that she told me in a short tone that she'd call me back up in a minute.  After 30 minutes, she then decides to call me up and take my form and ID (no idea why she couldn't have taken the time to do that when I signed in because no one else was waiting and she was literally just sitting there.  From there, it took another hour, AN HOUR, to even be called back for the screening.  It is absolutely ridiculous to have to wait that long to complete a screening that literally takes 5 minutes.  Changing jobs is hard enough without making your current employer aware by taking a 2 hour lunch break!  They need to reorganize and replace their current staff with ones that understand how hospitality works.

name: K P
text: Very good experience.  Lottie was wonderful, very friendly and helpful!  She also was able to draw the blood painlessly!  Will be back!!

name: Bham Onion
text:
Went there today expecting a issue and they did not let me down.  No sign in sheet so the person keeping the seat warm asked me,  not for my name but for my cell number and someone would call me.
30 minutes later when I still had not been called I went back to the counter to find 3 seat warmers who were all amazed that the previous seat warmer had not done anything past taking my number.

Who runs that place?

name: Joseph Butts
text:
Got a set of cultures done and the prices where:
Aerobic culture: $82
Anaerobic: $160
Sensitivity: $60

How in the world to people pay for this without insurance. That’s ridiculous. This is why people try avoiding the doctors office.

name: Chase Bower
text: The ladies at the front desk are very rude and will not try to help you. They looked for every reason not to see me and did not try to work with me at all. Every time I asked a question she was condescending and unpleasant.

name: ricdady77 Stewart
text: Getting simple access to a person is very difficult. I work at a hospice and wanted to pick up supply for blood draw and spent 30 minutes on the phone and still was not able to reach a person to arrange pick up of tubes for lab draw.

name: zack haynes
text: I have never left a review of any kind on any business but I just felt like I had to say how horrible this place was. Waited 2 hours got skipped in line several times when I finally went to the desk they said “oh we’re sorry you’ll be next” this place is a JOKE. I wouldn’t recommend this place to my worst enemy.

name: B B
text: Long wait, inconvenient hours, and rude unprofessional staff. Botched my screen and had to go to another branch. Totally unacceptable.

name: Shirley Edwards
text: VERY UNKIND AND UNPROFESSIONAL PEOPLE AT THIS LOCATION ... I WILL NOT  GO INTO DETAIL BUT I PASSED MY DRIG TEST THANK GOD ...

name: Carly Speeg
text: The worker of this clinic was absolutely awful.  She was extremely rude to my husband who is preparing for school.  Next time we will go elsewhere.

name: Graham Pointer
text: I really like the people who work there. They always treat me fair, and they respect my time.

name: Arthur Heraud
text:
An hour wait in the lobby. Finally it took me 30 seconds to leave a urine sample for school

Technicians demeanor was that of a probation officer

Maybe they were just understaffed but regardless

name: Tonya Lawson
text: How hard is it to have a human answer the phone?!?

name: Skylar Alexander-Brown
text: Don't bother making an appointment

name: Madison Jenkins
text: They were very rude and extremely disorganized. They do not greet you or make eye contact and no smiles anywhere. Very demanding ! Would not reccommend this place
